thread.title: BIANCA SUAREZ

author: BIANCA SUAREZ
title: BIANCA SUAREZ
text:
First of all I was advised that my order would be delayed 5-7 business days because my contacts are out of stock, which that is ok. My problem is that I haven't received any other updates on my order.
My mother Marina Taboada recommended me and is thinking twice about reconnecting my 2 brothers and anyone else.
I expect an answer in regards to my contacts ASAP add you already took the money $81 out of my account.
Bianca
cc: Marina Taboada
